overview: The short film Personae is based on isolation, duplication, and repetition, deriving its wit and complexity from simple movements. The protagonists of the three-generation piece are its author, his girlfriend, and his daughter. Personae follows the symmetry of a butterfly. Bodies simultaneously measure the space while evading each other, and in temporal displacement they test and alphabet of relations, presence and echo.
title: Personae (Drei Generationen)
